Rent or purchase a bicycle or scooter for the purpose of traveling to nearby cities.
Walk or hike to the nearest train station, if walking or hiking is feasible and safe.
Use alternative modes of transportation such as electric scooters, motorcycles, or bikes if it is faster than public transportation or if walking is not feasible.
If you have friends or family in another city, ask them to provide transportation or arrange for you to stay with them.
Use alternative modes of transportation such as taxis, rideshares or carpool if the problem is local.
